name: ANIMAL FOREST NES
description:
Does not follow the theme sorry :(

in menu press "left " and   "down"  in fishing  minigame
when in doubt, press the arrows or space

Music isn't mine, is from a youtuber called Tater-tot-tunes, PLEASE, YOU MUST SEE HIS VIDEOS, IT IS AMAZING, PLEASE DON'T SUE ME HAHA

Original game, characters and music by: (gues who) Nintendo

All other by: Me, the live puppet on pixel-art created by a crayzy men.
